  background-color: #007bff;

<script>
function submitForm() {

  const apiEndpoint = 'https://3cknh7pjj3.execute-api.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/prod/contacts/new';

  const contactName = document.getElementById("name").value;
  const contactEmail = document.getElementById("email").value;
  const contactInstitution = document.getElementById("institution").value;
  const contactSubject = document.getElementById("subject").value;
  const contactMessage = document.getElementById("message").value;

  const constantData = {
    "contactName": contactName,
    "contactEmail": contactEmail,
    "contactInstitution": contactInstitution,
    "contactSubject": contactSubject,
    "contactMessage": contactMessage
  };

  //Your post request using FETCH
  fetch(apiEndpoint, {
          method: 'POST',
          body: JSON.stringify(constantData),
          });
  alert("Your Contact Form has been sent successfully!");
}
</script>

<div class="form-container">
  <form onsubmit="submitForm(); return false;">
    <label class="form-label" for="name">Name:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="name" name="name" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="email">Email:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="email" id="email" name="email" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="institution">Institution:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="institution" name="institution" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="subject">Subject:</label><br>
    <input class="form-input" type="text" id="subject" name="subject" required><br>
    <label class="form-label" for="message">Message:</label><br>
    <textarea class="form-input" id="message" name="message" rows="4" required></textarea><br>
    <input class="form-submit" type="submit" value="Send">
  </form>
</div>
